enumeratedValue.name: SEC_2
enumeratedValue.description: MCU security status is unsecure

enumeratedValue.name: SEC_3
enumeratedValue.description: MCU security status is secure

enumeratedValue.name: FSLACC_2
enumeratedValue.description: Freescale factory access denied

enumeratedValue.name: FSLACC_3
enumeratedValue.description: Freescale factory access granted

enumeratedValue.name: MEEN_2
enumeratedValue.description: Mass erase is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: MEEN_3
enumeratedValue.description: Mass erase is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: KEYEN_2
enumeratedValue.description: Backdoor key access enabled

enumeratedValue.name: KEYEN_3
enumeratedValue.description: Backdoor key access disabled

enumeratedValue.name: LPBOOT_0
enumeratedValue.description: Low-power boot

enumeratedValue.name: LPBOOT_1
enumeratedValue.description: Normal boot

enumeratedValue.name: NMI_DIS_0
enumeratedValue.description: NMI interrupts are always blocked

enumeratedValue.name: NMI_DIS_1
enumeratedValue.description: NMI_b pin/interrupts reset default to enabled

enumeratedValue.name: RESET_PIN_CFG_0
enumeratedValue.description: RESET pin is disabled following a POR and cannot be enabled as reset function

enumeratedValue.name: RESET_PIN_CFG_1
enumeratedValue.description: RESET_b pin is dedicated

enumeratedValue.name: EDBG_0
enumeratedValue.description: When in debug mode, the DMA continues to operate.

enumeratedValue.name: EDBG_1
enumeratedValue.description: When in debug mode, the DMA stalls the start of a new channel. Executing channels are allowed to complete. Channel execution resumes when the system exits debug mode or the EDBG bit is cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: ERCA_0
enumeratedValue.description: Fixed priority arbitration is used for channel selection .

enumeratedValue.name: ERCA_1
enumeratedValue.description: Round robin arbitration is used for channel selection .

enumeratedValue.name: HOE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal operation

enumeratedValue.name: HOE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Any error causes the HALT bit to set. Subsequently, all service requests are ignored until the HALT bit is cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: HALT_0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal operation

enumeratedValue.name: HALT_1
enumeratedValue.description: Stall the start of any new channels. Executing channels are allowed to complete. Channel execution resumes when this bit is cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: CLM_0
enumeratedValue.description: A minor loop channel link made to itself goes through channel arbitration before being activated again.

enumeratedValue.name: CLM_1
enumeratedValue.description: A minor loop channel link made to itself does not go through channel arbitration before being activated again. Upon minor loop completion, the channel activates again if that channel has a minor loop channel link enabled and the link channel is itself. This effectively applies the minor loop offsets and restarts the next minor loop.

enumeratedValue.name: EMLM_0
enumeratedValue.description: Disabled. TCDn.word2 is defined as a 32-bit NBYTES field.

enumeratedValue.name: EMLM_1
enumeratedValue.description: Enabled. TCDn.word2 is redefined to include individual enable fields, an offset field, and the NBYTES field. The individual enable fields allow the minor loop offset to be applied to the source address, the destination address, or both. The NBYTES field is reduced when either offset is enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: ECX_0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal operation

enumeratedValue.name: ECX_1
enumeratedValue.description: Cancel the remaining data transfer in the same fashion as the CX bit. Stop the executing channel and force the minor loop to finish. The cancel takes effect after the last write of the current read/write sequence. The ECX bit clears itself after the cancel is honored. In addition to cancelling the transfer, ECX treats the cancel as an error condition, thus updating the Error Status register (DMAx_ES) and generating an optional error interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: CX_0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal operation

enumeratedValue.name: CX_1
enumeratedValue.description: Cancel the remaining data transfer. Stop the executing channel and force the minor loop to finish. The cancel takes effect after the last write of the current read/write sequence. The CX bit clears itself after the cancel has been honored. This cancel retires the channel normally as if the minor loop was completed.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE_0
enumeratedValue.description: eDMA is idle.

enumeratedValue.name: ACTIVE_1
enumeratedValue.description: eDMA is executing a channel.

enumeratedValue.name: DBE_0
enumeratedValue.description: No destination bus error

enumeratedValue.name: DBE_1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a bus error on a destination write

enumeratedValue.name: SBE_0
enumeratedValue.description: No source bus error

enumeratedValue.name: SBE_1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a bus error on a source read

enumeratedValue.name: SGE_0
enumeratedValue.description: No scatter/gather configuration error

enumeratedValue.name: SGE_1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_DLASTSGA field. This field is checked at the beginning of a scatter/gather operation after major loop completion if TCDn_CSR[ESG] is enabled. TCDn_DLASTSGA is not on a 32 byte boundary.

enumeratedValue.name: NCE_0
enumeratedValue.description: No NBYTES/CITER configuration error

enumeratedValue.name: NCE_1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_NBYTES or TCDn_CITER fields. TCDn_NBYTES is not a multiple of TCDn_ATTR[SSIZE] and TCDn_ATTR[DSIZE], or TCDn_CITER[CITER] is equal to zero, or TCDn_CITER[ELINK] is not equal to TCDn_BITER[ELINK]

enumeratedValue.name: DOE_0
enumeratedValue.description: No destination offset configuration error

enumeratedValue.name: DOE_1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_DOFF field. TCDn_DOFF is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[DSIZE].

enumeratedValue.name: DAE_0
enumeratedValue.description: No destination address configuration error

enumeratedValue.name: DAE_1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_DADDR field. TCDn_DADDR is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[DSIZE].

enumeratedValue.name: SOE_0
enumeratedValue.description: No source offset configuration error

enumeratedValue.name: SOE_1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_SOFF field. TCDn_SOFF is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[SSIZE].

enumeratedValue.name: SAE_0
enumeratedValue.description: No source address configuration error.

enumeratedValue.name: SAE_1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error detected in the TCDn_SADDR field. TCDn_SADDR is inconsistent with TCDn_ATTR[SSIZE].

field.name: ERRCHN
field.description: Error Channel Number or Canceled Channel Number

enumeratedValue.name: CPE_0
enumeratedValue.description: No channel priority error

enumeratedValue.name: CPE_1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded error was a configuration error in the channel priorities . Channel priorities are not unique.

enumeratedValue.name: ECX_0
enumeratedValue.description: No canceled transfers

enumeratedValue.name: ECX_1
enumeratedValue.description: The last recorded entry was a canceled transfer by the error cancel transfer input

field.name: VLD
field.description: Logical OR of all ERR status bits

enumeratedValue.name: VLD_0
enumeratedValue.description: No ERR bits are set.

enumeratedValue.name: VLD_1
enumeratedValue.description: At least one ERR bit is set indicating a valid error exists that has not been cleared.

register.description: TCD Signed Minor Loop Offset (Minor Loop Mapping and Offset Enabled)

field.name: MLOFF
field.description: If SMLOE or DMLOE is set, this field represents a sign-extended offset applied to the source or destination address to form the next-state value after the minor loop completes.

enumeratedValue.name: DMLOE_0
enumeratedValue.description: The minor loop offset is not applied to the DADDR

enumeratedValue.name: DMLOE_1
enumeratedValue.description: The minor loop offset is applied to the DADDR

enumeratedValue.name: SMLOE_0
enumeratedValue.description: The minor loop offset is not applied to the SADDR

enumeratedValue.name: SMLOE_1
enumeratedValue.description: The minor loop offset is applied to the SADDR

register.name: TCD%s_CITER_ELINKNO
register.description: TCD Current Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Disabled)

field.name: ELINK
field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on minor-loop complete

enumeratedValue.name: ELINK_0
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: ELINK_1
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled

register.name: TCD%s_CITER_ELINKYES
register.description: TCD Current Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Enabled)

field.name: ELINK
field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on minor-loop complete

enumeratedValue.name: ELINK_0
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: ELINK_1
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled

register.name: TCD%s_DLASTSGA
register.description: TCD Last Destination Address Adjustment/Scatter Gather Address

field.name: DLASTSGA
field.description: Destination last address adjustment or the memory address for the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel (scatter/gather)

enumeratedValue.name: START_0
enumeratedValue.description: The channel is not explicitly started.

enumeratedValue.name: START_1
enumeratedValue.description: The channel is explicitly started via a software initiated service request.

field.name: INTMAJOR
field.description: Enable an interrupt when major iteration count completes.

enumeratedValue.name: INTMAJOR_0
enumeratedValue.description: The end-of-major loop interrupt is disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: INTMAJOR_1
enumeratedValue.description: The end-of-major loop interrupt is enabled.

field.name: INTHALF
field.description: Enable an interrupt when major counter is half complete.

enumeratedValue.name: INTHALF_0
enumeratedValue.description: The half-point interrupt is disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: INTHALF_1
enumeratedValue.description: The half-point interrupt is enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: DREQ_0
enumeratedValue.description: The channel's ERQ bit is not affected.

enumeratedValue.name: DREQ_1
enumeratedValue.description: The channel's ERQ bit is cleared when the major loop is complete.

enumeratedValue.name: ESG_0
enumeratedValue.description: The current channel's TCD is normal format.

enumeratedValue.name: ESG_1
enumeratedValue.description: The current channel's TCD specifies a scatter gather format. The DLASTSGA field provides a memory pointer to the next TCD to be loaded into this channel after the major loop completes its execution.

field.name: MAJORELINK
field.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on major loop complete

enumeratedValue.name: MAJORELINK_0
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: MAJORELINK_1
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: BWC_0
enumeratedValue.description: No eDMA engine stalls.

enumeratedValue.name: BWC_2
enumeratedValue.description: eDMA engine stalls for 4 cycles after each R/W.

enumeratedValue.name: BWC_3
enumeratedValue.description: eDMA engine stalls for 8 cycles after each R/W.

register.name: TCD%s_BITER_ELINKNO
register.description: TCD Beginning Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Disabled)

field.name: ELINK
field.description: Enables channel-to-channel linking on minor loop complete

enumeratedValue.name: ELINK_0
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: ELINK_1
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled

register.name: TCD%s_BITER_ELINKYES
register.description: TCD Beginning Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Enabled)

field.name: ELINK
field.description: Enables channel-to-channel linking on minor loop complete

enumeratedValue.name: ELINK_0
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: ELINK_1
enumeratedValue.description: The channel-to-channel linking is enabled

field.name: MGSTAT0
field.description: Memory Controller Command Completion Status Flag

enumeratedValue.name: FPVIOL_0
enumeratedValue.description: No protection violation detected

enumeratedValue.name: FPVIOL_1
enumeratedValue.description: Protection violation detected

enumeratedValue.name: ACCERR_0
enumeratedValue.description: No access error detected

enumeratedValue.name: ACCERR_1
enumeratedValue.description: Access error detected

enumeratedValue.name: RDCOLERR_0
enumeratedValue.description: No collision error detected

enumeratedValue.name: RDCOLERR_1
enumeratedValue.description: Collision error detected

enumeratedValue.name: CCIF_0
enumeratedValue.description: Flash command in progress

enumeratedValue.name: CCIF_1
enumeratedValue.description: Flash command has completed

enumeratedValue.name: ERSSUSP_0
enumeratedValue.description: No suspend requested

enumeratedValue.name: ERSSUSP_1
enumeratedValue.description: Suspend the current Erase Flash Sector command execution.

enumeratedValue.name: ERSAREQ_0
enumeratedValue.description: No request or request complete

enumeratedValue.name: ERSAREQ_1
enumeratedValue.description: Request to: run the Erase All Blocks command, verify the erased state, program the security byte in the Flash Configuration Field to the unsecure state, and release MCU security by setting the FSEC[SEC] field to the unsecure state.

enumeratedValue.name: RDCOLLIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Read collision error interrupt disabled

enumeratedValue.name: RDCOLLIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Read collision error interrupt enabled. An interrupt request is generated whenever a flash memory read collision error is detected (see the description of FSTAT[RDCOLERR]).

enumeratedValue.name: CCIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Command complete interrupt disabled

enumeratedValue.name: CCIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Command complete interrupt enabled. An interrupt request is generated whenever the FSTAT[CCIF] flag is set.

enumeratedValue.name: SEC_0
enumeratedValue.description: MCU security status is secure.

enumeratedValue.name: SEC_1
enumeratedValue.description: MCU security status is secure.

enumeratedValue.name: SEC_2
enumeratedValue.description: MCU security status is unsecure. (The standard shipping condition of the flash memory module is unsecure.)

enumeratedValue.name: SEC_3
enumeratedValue.description: MCU security status is secure.

enumeratedValue.name: FSLACC_0
enumeratedValue.description: NXP factory access granted

enumeratedValue.name: FSLACC_1
enumeratedValue.description: NXP factory access denied

enumeratedValue.name: FSLACC_2
enumeratedValue.description: NXP factory access denied

enumeratedValue.name: FSLACC_3
enumeratedValue.description: NXP factory access granted

enumeratedValue.name: MEEN_0
enumeratedValue.description: Mass erase is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: MEEN_1
enumeratedValue.description: Mass erase is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: MEEN_2
enumeratedValue.description: Mass erase is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: MEEN_3
enumeratedValue.description: Mass erase is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: KEYEN_0
enumeratedValue.description: Backdoor key access disabled

enumeratedValue.name: KEYEN_1
enumeratedValue.description: Backdoor key access disabled (preferred KEYEN state to disable backdoor key access)

enumeratedValue.name: KEYEN_2
enumeratedValue.description: Backdoor key access enabled

enumeratedValue.name: KEYEN_3
enumeratedValue.description: Backdoor key access disabled

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Triggering is disabled. If triggering is disabled and ENBL is set, the DMA Channel will simply route the specified source to the DMA channel. (Normal mode)

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: Triggering is enabled. If triggering is enabled and ENBL is set, the DMAMUX is in Periodic Trigger mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValue.description: DMA channel is disabled. This mode is primarily used during configuration of the DMAMux. The DMA has separate channel enables/disables, which should be used to disable or reconfigure a DMA channel.

enumeratedValue.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValue.description: DMA channel is enabled

peripheral.name: LPSPI0
peripheral.description: The LPSPI Memory Map/Register Definition can be found here.

enumeratedValue.name: FEATURE_4
enumeratedValue.description: Standard feature set supporting 32-bit shift register.

enumeratedValue.name: MEN_0
enumeratedValue.description: Module is disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: MEN_1
enumeratedValue.description: Module is enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: RST_0
enumeratedValue.description: Master logic is not reset.

enumeratedValue.name: RST_1
enumeratedValue.description: Master logic is reset.

enumeratedValue.name: DOZEN_0
enumeratedValue.description: Module is enabled in Doze mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DOZEN_1
enumeratedValue.description: Module is disabled in Doze mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DBGEN_0
enumeratedValue.description: Module is disabled in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DBGEN_1
enumeratedValue.description: Module is enabled in debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: RTF_0
enumeratedValue.description: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: RTF_1
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit FIFO is reset.

enumeratedValue.name: RRF_0
enumeratedValue.description: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: RRF_1
enumeratedValue.description: Receive FIFO is reset.

enumeratedValue.name: TDF_0
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit data not requested.

enumeratedValue.name: TDF_1
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit data is requested.

enumeratedValue.name: RDF_0
enumeratedValue.description: Receive Data is not ready.

enumeratedValue.name: RDF_1
enumeratedValue.description: Receive data is ready.

enumeratedValue.name: WCF_0
enumeratedValue.description: Transfer word not completed.

enumeratedValue.name: WCF_1
enumeratedValue.description: Transfer word completed.

enumeratedValue.name: FCF_0
enumeratedValue.description: Frame transfer has not completed.

enumeratedValue.name: FCF_1
enumeratedValue.description: Frame transfer has completed.

enumeratedValue.name: TCF_0
enumeratedValue.description: All transfers have not completed.

enumeratedValue.name: TCF_1
enumeratedValue.description: All transfers have completed.

enumeratedValue.name: TEF_0
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit FIFO underrun has not occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: TEF_1
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit FIFO underrun has occurred

enumeratedValue.name: REF_0
enumeratedValue.description: Receive FIFO has not overflowed.

enumeratedValue.name: REF_1
enumeratedValue.description: Receive FIFO has overflowed.

enumeratedValue.name: DMF_0
enumeratedValue.description: Have not received matching data.

enumeratedValue.name: DMF_1
enumeratedValue.description: Have received matching data.

enumeratedValue.name: MBF_0
enumeratedValue.description: LPSPI is idle.

enumeratedValue.name: MBF_1
enumeratedValue.description: LPSPI is busy.

enumeratedValue.name: TDIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TDIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt enabled

enumeratedValue.name: RDIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: RDIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: WCIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: WCIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: FCIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: FCIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TCIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TCIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TEIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TEIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: REIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: REIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: DMIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: DMIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TDDE_0
enumeratedValue.description: DMA request disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TDDE_1
enumeratedValue.description: DMA request enabled

enumeratedValue.name: RDDE_0
enumeratedValue.description: DMA request disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: RDDE_1
enumeratedValue.description: DMA request enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: HREN_0
enumeratedValue.description: Host request is disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: HREN_1
enumeratedValue.description: Host request is enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: HRPOL_0
enumeratedValue.description: Active low.

enumeratedValue.name: HRPOL_1
enumeratedValue.description: Active high.

enumeratedValue.name: HRSEL_0
enumeratedValue.description: Host request input is pin LPSPI_HREQ.

enumeratedValue.name: HRSEL_1
enumeratedValue.description: Host request input is input trigger.

enumeratedValue.name: CIRFIFO_0
enumeratedValue.description: Circular FIFO is disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: CIRFIFO_1
enumeratedValue.description: Circular FIFO is enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: RDMO_0
enumeratedValue.description: Received data is stored in the receive FIFO as normal.

enumeratedValue.name: RDMO_1
enumeratedValue.description: Received data is discarded unless the DMF is set.

enumeratedValue.name: MASTER_0
enumeratedValue.description: Slave mode.

enumeratedValue.name: MASTER_1
enumeratedValue.description: Master mode.

enumeratedValue.name: SAMPLE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Input data sampled on SCK edge.

enumeratedValue.name: SAMPLE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Input data sampled on delayed SCK edge.

enumeratedValue.name: AUTOPCS_0
enumeratedValue.description: Automatic PCS generation disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: AUTOPCS_1
enumeratedValue.description: Automatic PCS generation enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: NOSTALL_0
enumeratedValue.description: Transfers will stall when transmit FIFO is empty or receive FIFO is full.

enumeratedValue.name: NOSTALL_1
enumeratedValue.description: Transfers will not stall, allowing transmit FIFO underrun or receive FIFO overrun to occur.

enumeratedValue.name: PCSPOL_0
enumeratedValue.description: The PCSx is active low.

enumeratedValue.name: PCSPOL_1
enumeratedValue.description: The PCSx is active high.

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_0
enumeratedValue.description: Match disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_2
enumeratedValue.description: Match enabled (1st data word equals MATCH0 OR MATCH1).

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_3
enumeratedValue.description: Match enabled (any data word equals MATCH0 OR MATCH1).

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_4
enumeratedValue.description: Match enabled (1st data word equals MATCH0 AND 2nd data word equals MATCH1).

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_5
enumeratedValue.description: Match enabled (any data word equals MATCH0 AND next data word equals MATCH1)

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_6
enumeratedValue.description: Match enabled (1st data word AND MATCH1 equals MATCH0 AND MATCH1)

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_7
enumeratedValue.description: Match enabled (any data word AND MATCH1 equals MATCH0 AND MATCH1).

enumeratedValue.name: PINCFG_0
enumeratedValue.description: SIN is used for input data and SOUT for output data.

enumeratedValue.name: PINCFG_1
enumeratedValue.description: SIN is used for both input and output data.

enumeratedValue.name: PINCFG_2
enumeratedValue.description: SOUT is used for both input and output data.

enumeratedValue.name: PINCFG_3
enumeratedValue.description: SOUT is used for input data and SIN for output data.

enumeratedValue.name: OUTCFG_0
enumeratedValue.description: Output data retains last value when chip select is negated.

enumeratedValue.name: OUTCFG_1
enumeratedValue.description: Output data is tristated when chip select is negated.

enumeratedValue.name: PCSCFG_0
enumeratedValue.description: PCS[3:2] are enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: PCSCFG_1
enumeratedValue.description: PCS[3:2] are disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: WIDTH_0
enumeratedValue.description: Single bit transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: WIDTH_1
enumeratedValue.description: Two bit transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: WIDTH_2
enumeratedValue.description: Four bit transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: TXMSK_0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: TXMSK_1
enumeratedValue.description: Mask transmit data.

enumeratedValue.name: RXMSK_0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: RXMSK_1
enumeratedValue.description: Receive data is masked.

enumeratedValue.name: CONTC_0
enumeratedValue.description: Command word for start of new transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: CONTC_1
enumeratedValue.description: Command word for continuing transfer.

enumeratedValue.name: CONT_0
enumeratedValue.description: Continuous transfer disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: CONT_1
enumeratedValue.description: Continuous transfer enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: BYSW_0
enumeratedValue.description: Byte swap disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: BYSW_1
enumeratedValue.description: Byte swap enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: LSBF_0
enumeratedValue.description: Data is transferred MSB first.

enumeratedValue.name: LSBF_1
enumeratedValue.description: Data is transferred LSB first.

enumeratedValue.name: PCS_0
enumeratedValue.description: Transfer using LPSPI_PCS[0]

enumeratedValue.name: PCS_1
enumeratedValue.description: Transfer using LPSPI_PCS[1]

enumeratedValue.name: PCS_2
enumeratedValue.description: Transfer using LPSPI_PCS[2]

enumeratedValue.name: PCS_3
enumeratedValue.description: Transfer using LPSPI_PCS[3]

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Divide by 1.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Divide by 2.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_2
enumeratedValue.description: Divide by 4.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_3
enumeratedValue.description: Divide by 8.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_4
enumeratedValue.description: Divide by 16.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_5
enumeratedValue.description: Divide by 32.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_6
enumeratedValue.description: Divide by 64.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_7
enumeratedValue.description: Divide by 128.

enumeratedValue.name: CPHA_0
enumeratedValue.description: Data is captured on the leading edge of SCK and changed on the following edge.

enumeratedValue.name: CPHA_1
enumeratedValue.description: Data is changed on the leading edge of SCK and captured on the following edge.

enumeratedValue.name: CPOL_0
enumeratedValue.description: The inactive state value of SCK is low.

enumeratedValue.name: CPOL_1
enumeratedValue.description: The inactive state value of SCK is high.

enumeratedValue.name: SOF_0
enumeratedValue.description: Subsequent data word received after LPSPI_PCS assertion.

enumeratedValue.name: SOF_1
enumeratedValue.description: First data word received after LPSPI_PCS assertion.

enumeratedValue.name: RXEMPTY_0
enumeratedValue.description: RX FIFO is not empty.

enumeratedValue.name: RXEMPTY_1
enumeratedValue.description: RX FIFO is empty.

field.name: DATAL
field.description: DATAL stores the lower 16 bits of the 16/32 bit CRC

field.name: DATALL
field.description: CRCLL stores the first 8 bits of the 32 bit DATA

field.name: DATALU
field.description: DATALL stores the second 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

field.name: DATAH
field.description: DATAH stores the high 16 bits of the 16/32 bit CRC

field.name: DATAHL
field.description: DATAHL stores the third 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

field.name: DATAHU
field.description: DATAHU stores the fourth 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

field.name: GPOLYL

enumeratedValue.name: AVGE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Hardware average function enabled.

enumeratedValue.description: One conversion will be performed (or one set of conversions, if AVGE is set) after a conversion is initiated.

enumeratedValue.name: ADCO_1
enumeratedValue.description: Continuous conversions will be performed (or continuous sets of conversions, if AVGE is set) after a conversion is initiated.

register.name: CSR
register.description: Low Power Timer Control Status Register

enumeratedValue.name: TEN_0
enumeratedValue.description: LPTMR is disabled and internal logic is reset.

enumeratedValue.name: TEN_1
enumeratedValue.description: LPTMR is enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TMS_0
enumeratedValue.description: Time Counter mode.

enumeratedValue.name: TMS_1
enumeratedValue.description: Pulse Counter mode.

enumeratedValue.name: TFC_0
enumeratedValue.description: CNR is reset whenever TCF is set.

enumeratedValue.name: TFC_1
enumeratedValue.description: CNR is reset on overflow.

enumeratedValue.name: TPP_0
enumeratedValue.description: Pulse Counter input source is active-high, and the CNR will increment on the rising-edge.

enumeratedValue.name: TPP_1
enumeratedValue.description: Pulse Counter input source is active-low, and the CNR will increment on the falling-edge.

enumeratedValue.name: TPS_0
enumeratedValue.description: Pulse counter input 0 is selected.

enumeratedValue.name: TPS_1
enumeratedValue.description: Pulse counter input 1 is selected.

enumeratedValue.name: TPS_2
enumeratedValue.description: Pulse counter input 2 is selected.

enumeratedValue.name: TPS_3
enumeratedValue.description: Pulse counter input 3 is selected.

enumeratedValue.name: TIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Timer interrupt disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Timer interrupt enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TCF_0
enumeratedValue.description: The value of CNR is not equal to CMR and increments.

enumeratedValue.name: TCF_1
enumeratedValue.description: The value of CNR is equal to CMR and increments.

enumeratedValue.name: TDRE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Timer DMA Request disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TDRE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Timer DMA Request enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: PCS_0
enumeratedValue.description: Prescaler/glitch filter clock 0 selected.

enumeratedValue.name: PCS_1
enumeratedValue.description: Prescaler/glitch filter clock 1 selected.

enumeratedValue.name: PCS_2
enumeratedValue.description: Prescaler/glitch filter clock 2 selected.

enumeratedValue.name: PCS_3
enumeratedValue.description: Prescaler/glitch filter clock 3 selected.

enumeratedValue.name: PBYP_0
enumeratedValue.description: Prescaler/glitch filter is enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: PBYP_1
enumeratedValue.description: Prescaler/glitch filter is bypassed.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 2; glitch filter does not support this configuration.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 4; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 2 rising clock edges.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_2
enumeratedValue.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 8; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 4 rising clock edges.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_3
enumeratedValue.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 16; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 8 rising clock edges.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_4

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_5

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_6
enumeratedValue.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 128; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 64 rising clock edges.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_7
enumeratedValue.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 256; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 128 rising clock edges.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_8

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_9

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_10

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_11
enumeratedValue.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 4096; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 2048 rising clock edges.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_12

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_13
enumeratedValue.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 16,384; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 8192 rising clock edges.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_14
enumeratedValue.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 32,768; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 16,384 rising clock edges.

enumeratedValue.name: PRESCALE_15

register.name: GENCS
register.description: TSI General Control and Status Register

field.name: EOSDMEO
field.description: End-of-Scan DMA Transfer Request Enable Only

enumeratedValue.name: EOSDMEO_0
enumeratedValue.description: Do not enable the End-of-Scan DMA transfer request only. Depending on ESOR state, either Out-of-Range or End-of-Scan can trigger a DMA transfer request and interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: EOSDMEO_1
enumeratedValue.description: Only the End-of-Scan event can trigger a DMA transfer request. The Out-of-Range event only and always triggers an interrupt if TSIIE is set.

enumeratedValue.name: EOSF_0
enumeratedValue.description: Scan not complete.

enumeratedValue.name: EOSF_1
enumeratedValue.description: Scan complete.

enumeratedValue.name: SCNIP_0
enumeratedValue.description: No scan in progress.

enumeratedValue.name: SCNIP_1
enumeratedValue.description: Scan in progress.

enumeratedValue.name: STM_0
enumeratedValue.description: Software trigger scan.

enumeratedValue.name: STM_1
enumeratedValue.description: Hardware trigger scan.

enumeratedValue.name: STPE_0
enumeratedValue.description: TSI is disabled when MCU goes into low power mode.

enumeratedValue.name: STPE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Allows TSI to continue running in all low power modes.

enumeratedValue.name: TSIIEN_0

enumeratedValue.name: TSIIEN_1

enumeratedValue.name: TSIEN_0

enumeratedValue.name: TSIEN_1

enumeratedValue.name: INT_ZERO
enumeratedValue.description: ISF flag and Interrupt when logic 0.

enumeratedValue.name: INT_RISING
enumeratedValue.description: ISF flag and Interrupt on rising-edge.

enumeratedValue.name: INT_FALLING
enumeratedValue.description: ISF flag and Interrupt on falling-edge.

enumeratedValue.name: INT_BOTH
enumeratedValue.description: ISF flag and Interrupt on either edge.

enumeratedValue.name: INT_ONE
enumeratedValue.description: ISF flag and Interrupt when logic 1.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_DETECTED
enumeratedValue.description: Configured interrupt is not detected.

enumeratedValue.name: DETECTED
enumeratedValue.description: Configured interrupt is detected. If the pin is configured to generate a DMA request, then the corresponding flag will be cleared automatically at the completion of the requested DMA transfer. Otherwise, the flag remains set until a logic 1 is written to the flag. If the pin is configured for a level sensitive interrupt and the pin remains asserted, then the flag is set again immediately after it is cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: NOT_DETECTED
enumeratedValue.description: Configured interrupt is not detected.

enumeratedValue.name: DETECTED
enumeratedValue.description: Configured interrupt is detected. If the pin is configured to generate a DMA request, then the corresponding flag will be cleared automatically at the completion of the requested DMA transfer. Otherwise, the flag remains set until a logic 1 is written to the flag. If the pin is configured for a level sensitive interrupt and the pin remains asserted, then the flag is set again immediately after it is cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: BUS
enumeratedValue.description: Digital filters are clocked by the bus clock.

enumeratedValue.name: LPO
enumeratedValue.description: Digital filters are clocked by the LPO clock.

enumeratedValue.name: STOP_0
enumeratedValue.description: Watchdog disabled in chip stop mode.

enumeratedValue.name: STOP_1
enumeratedValue.description: Watchdog enabled in chip stop mode.

enumeratedValue.name: WAIT_0
enumeratedValue.description: Watchdog disabled in chip wait mode.

enumeratedValue.name: WAIT_1
enumeratedValue.description: Watchdog enabled in chip wait mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DBG_0
enumeratedValue.description: Watchdog disabled in chip debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: DBG_1
enumeratedValue.description: Watchdog enabled in chip debug mode.

enumeratedValue.name: TST_0
enumeratedValue.description: Watchdog test mode disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TST_1
enumeratedValue.description: Watchdog user mode enabled. (Watchdog test mode disabled.) After testing the watchdog, software should use this setting to indicate that the watchdog is functioning normally in user mode.

enumeratedValue.name: TST_2
enumeratedValue.description: Watchdog test mode enabled, only the low byte is used. CNT[CNTLOW] is compared with TOVAL[TOVALLOW].

enumeratedValue.name: TST_3
enumeratedValue.description: Watchdog test mode enabled, only the high byte is used. CNT[CNTHIGH] is compared with TOVAL[TOVALHIGH].

enumeratedValue.name: UPDATE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Updates not allowed. After the initial configuration, the watchdog cannot be later modified without forcing a reset.

enumeratedValue.name: UPDATE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Updates allowed. Software can modify the watchdog configuration registers within 128 bus clocks after performing the unlock write sequence.

enumeratedValue.name: INT_0
enumeratedValue.description: Watchdog interrupts are disabled. Watchdog resets are not delayed.

enumeratedValue.name: INT_1
enumeratedValue.description: Watchdog interrupts are enabled. Watchdog resets are delayed by 128 bus clocks from the interrupt vector fetch.

enumeratedValue.name: EN_0
enumeratedValue.description: Watchdog disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: EN_1
enumeratedValue.description: Watchdog enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: CLK_0
enumeratedValue.description: Bus clock

enumeratedValue.name: CLK_1
enumeratedValue.description: LPO clock

enumeratedValue.name: CLK_2
enumeratedValue.description: System oscillator clock (SOSC, from SCG)

enumeratedValue.name: CLK_3
enumeratedValue.description: Slow internal reference clock (SIRC, from SCG)

enumeratedValue.name: RCS_0
enumeratedValue.description: Reconfiguring WDOG.

enumeratedValue.name: RCS_1
enumeratedValue.description: Reconfiguration is successful.

enumeratedValue.name: ULK_0
enumeratedValue.description: WDOG is locked.

enumeratedValue.name: ULK_1
enumeratedValue.description: WDOG is unlocked.

enumeratedValue.name: PRES_0
enumeratedValue.description: 256 prescaler disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: PRES_1
enumeratedValue.description: 256 prescaler enabled.

field.name: CMD32EN
field.description: Enables or disables WDOG support for 32-bit (otherwise 16-bit or 8-bit) refresh/unlock command write words

enumeratedValue.name: CMD32EN_0
enumeratedValue.description: Disables support for 32-bit refresh/unlock command write words. Only 16-bit or 8-bit is supported.

enumeratedValue.name: CMD32EN_1
enumeratedValue.description: Enables support for 32-bit refresh/unlock command write words. 16-bit or 8-bit is NOT supported.

enumeratedValue.name: FLG_0
enumeratedValue.description: No interrupt occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: FLG_1
enumeratedValue.description: An interrupt occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: WIN_0
enumeratedValue.description: Window mode disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: WIN_1
enumeratedValue.description: Window mode enabled.

field.name: CNTLOW
field.description: Low byte of the Watchdog Counter

field.name: CNTHIGH
field.description: High byte of the Watchdog Counter

field.name: TOVALLOW
field.description: Low byte of the timeout value

field.name: TOVALHIGH
field.description: High byte of the timeout value

register.name: CS
register.description: Pulse Width Timer Control and Status Register

enumeratedValue.name: PWTOV_0
enumeratedValue.description: PWT counter no overflow.

enumeratedValue.name: PWTOV_1
enumeratedValue.description: PWT counter runs from 0xFFFF to 0x0000.

enumeratedValue.name: PWTRDY_0
enumeratedValue.description: PWT pulse width register(s) is not up-to-date.

enumeratedValue.name: PWTRDY_1
enumeratedValue.description: PWT pulse width register(s) has been updated.

field.name: FCTLE
field.description: First counter load enable after enable

enumeratedValue.name: FCTLE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Do not load the first counter values to corresponding registers

enumeratedValue.name: FCTLE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Load the first coutner value to corresponding registers depended by the PWTIN level

enumeratedValue.name: PWTSR_0
enumeratedValue.description: No action taken.

enumeratedValue.name: PWTSR_1
enumeratedValue.description: Writing 1 to this field will perform soft reset to PWT.

enumeratedValue.name: POVIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Disable PWT to generate interrupt when PWTOV is set.

enumeratedValue.name: POVIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Enable PWT to generate interrupt when PWTOV is set.

field.name: PRDYIE
field.description: PWT Pulse Width Data Ready Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValue.name: PRDYIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Disable PWT to generate interrupt when PWTRDY is set.

enumeratedValue.name: PRDYIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Enable PWT to generate interrupt when PWTRDY is set.

enumeratedValue.name: PWTIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Disables the PWT to generate interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: PWTIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Enables the PWT to generate interrupt.

enumeratedValue.name: PWTEN_0
enumeratedValue.description: The PWT is disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: PWTEN_1
enumeratedValue.description: The PWT is enabled.

enumeratedValue.description: Clock divided by 1.

enumeratedValue.name: PRE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Clock divided by 2.

enumeratedValue.description: Clock divided by 4.

enumeratedValue.name: PRE_3
enumeratedValue.description: Clock divided by 8.

enumeratedValue.name: PRE_4
enumeratedValue.description: Clock divided by 16.

enumeratedValue.name: PRE_5
enumeratedValue.description: Clock divided by 32.

enumeratedValue.name: PRE_6
enumeratedValue.description: Clock divided by 64.

enumeratedValue.name: PRE_7
enumeratedValue.description: Clock divided by 128.

field.name: TGL

enumeratedValue.description: The selected PWTIN hasn't changed its original states from last time.

enumeratedValue.name: TGL_1

peripheral.name: FLEXIO

enumeratedValue.name: FEATURE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Standard features implemented.

enumeratedValue.name: FEATURE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Supports state, logic and parallel modes.

enumeratedValue.name: FLEXEN_0

enumeratedValue.name: FLEXEN_1

enumeratedValue.name: SWRST_1

enumeratedValue.name: FASTACC_1
enumeratedValue.description: Configures for fast register accesses to FlexIO

enumeratedValue.name: DBGE_1

enumeratedValue.name: DOZEN_1
enumeratedValue.description: FlexIO disabled in Doze modes.

enumeratedValue.name: SSF_1

enumeratedValue.name: SEF_1

enumeratedValue.name: TSF_1

enumeratedValue.name: SSIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Shifter Status Flag interrupt enabled

enumeratedValue.name: SEIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Shifter Error Flag interrupt enabled

enumeratedValue.name: TEIE_0

enumeratedValue.name: TEIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Timer Status Flag interrupt is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: SSDE_0

enumeratedValue.name: SSDE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Shifter Status Flag DMA request is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: SMOD_0
enumeratedValue.description: Disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: SMOD_1
enumeratedValue.description: Receive mode. Captures the current Shifter content into the SHIFTBUF on expiration of the Timer.

enumeratedValue.name: SMOD_2
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit mode. Load SHIFTBUF contents into the Shifter on expiration of the Timer.

enumeratedValue.name: SMOD_4
enumeratedValue.description: Match Store mode. Shifter data is compared to SHIFTBUF content on expiration of the Timer.

enumeratedValue.name: SMOD_5
enumeratedValue.description: Match Continuous mode. Shifter data is continuously compared to SHIFTBUF contents.

enumeratedValue.name: PINPOL_1
enumeratedValue.description: Pin is active low

enumeratedValue.name: TIMPOL_1
enumeratedValue.description: Shift on negedge of Shift clock

enumeratedValue.description: Start bit disabled for transmitter/receiver/match store, transmitter loads data on enable

enumeratedValue.name: SSTART_1
enumeratedValue.description: Start bit disabled for transmitter/receiver/match store, transmitter loads data on first shift

enumeratedValue.name: SSTART_2
enumeratedValue.description: Transmitter outputs start bit value 0 before loading data on first shift, receiver/match store sets error flag if start bit is not 0

enumeratedValue.name: SSTART_3
enumeratedValue.description: Transmitter outputs start bit value 1 before loading data on first shift, receiver/match store sets error flag if start bit is not 1

enumeratedValue.name: SSTOP_0
enumeratedValue.description: Stop bit disabled for transmitter/receiver/match store

enumeratedValue.name: SSTOP_2
enumeratedValue.description: Transmitter outputs stop bit value 0 on store, receiver/match store sets error flag if stop bit is not 0

enumeratedValue.name: SSTOP_3
enumeratedValue.description: Transmitter outputs stop bit value 1 on store, receiver/match store sets error flag if stop bit is not 1

enumeratedValue.name: INSRC_1

enumeratedValue.name: TIMRST_2

enumeratedValue.name: TIMRST_7

enumeratedValue.description: Decrement counter on FlexIO clock, Shift clock equals Timer output.

enumeratedValue.name: TIMDEC_1
enumeratedValue.description: Decrement counter on Trigger input (both edges), Shift clock equals Timer output.

enumeratedValue.name: TIMDEC_2
enumeratedValue.description: Decrement counter on Pin input (both edges), Shift clock equals Pin input.

enumeratedValue.name: TIMDEC_3
enumeratedValue.description: Decrement counter on Trigger input (both edges), Shift clock equals Trigger input.

enumeratedValue.name: TIMOUT_0
enumeratedValue.description: Timer output is logic one when enabled and is not affected by timer reset

enumeratedValue.name: TIMOUT_1
enumeratedValue.description: Timer output is logic zero when enabled and is not affected by timer reset

enumeratedValue.name: TIMOUT_2
enumeratedValue.description: Timer output is logic one when enabled and on timer reset

enumeratedValue.name: TIMOUT_3
enumeratedValue.description: Timer output is logic zero when enabled and on timer reset

field.name: SERVICE
field.description: The EWM refresh mechanism requires the CPU to write two values to the SERV register: a first data byte of 0xB4, followed by a second data byte of 0x2C

field.name: COMPAREL
field.description: To prevent runaway code from changing this field, software should write to this field after a CPU reset even if the (default) minimum refresh time is required

field.name: COMPAREH
field.description: To prevent runaway code from changing this field, software should write to this field after a CPU reset even if the (default) maximum refresh time is required

enumeratedValue.name: AUTOSTOP_0
enumeratedValue.description: No effect.

enumeratedValue.name: AUTOSTOP_1
enumeratedValue.description: STOP condition is automatically generated whenever the transmit FIFO is empty and LPI2C master is busy.

field.name: IGNACK
field.description: When set, the received NACK field is ignored and assumed to be ACK

enumeratedValue.name: IGNACK_0
enumeratedValue.description: LPI2C Master will receive ACK and NACK normally.

enumeratedValue.name: IGNACK_1
enumeratedValue.description: LPI2C Master will treat a received NACK as if it was an ACK.

enumeratedValue.name: TIMECFG_0
enumeratedValue.description: Pin Low Timeout Flag will set if SCL is low for longer than the configured timeout.

enumeratedValue.name: TIMECFG_1
enumeratedValue.description: Pin Low Timeout Flag will set if either SCL or SDA is low for longer than the configured timeout.

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_0
enumeratedValue.description: Match disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_2
enumeratedValue.description: Match enabled (1st data word equals MATCH0 OR MATCH1).

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_3
enumeratedValue.description: Match enabled (any data word equals MATCH0 OR MATCH1).

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_4
enumeratedValue.description: Match enabled (1st data word equals MATCH0 AND 2nd data word equals MATCH1).

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_5
enumeratedValue.description: Match enabled (any data word equals MATCH0 AND next data word equals MATCH1).

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_6
enumeratedValue.description: Match enabled (1st data word AND MATCH1 equals MATCH0 AND MATCH1).

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_7
enumeratedValue.description: Match enabled (any data word AND MATCH1 equals MATCH0 AND MATCH1).

enumeratedValue.name: PINCFG_0
enumeratedValue.description: LPI2C configured for 2-pin open drain mode.

enumeratedValue.name: PINCFG_1
enumeratedValue.description: LPI2C configured for 2-pin output only mode (ultra-fast mode).

enumeratedValue.name: PINCFG_2
enumeratedValue.description: LPI2C configured for 2-pin push-pull mode.

enumeratedValue.name: PINCFG_3
enumeratedValue.description: LPI2C configured for 4-pin push-pull mode.

enumeratedValue.name: PINCFG_4
enumeratedValue.description: LPI2C configured for 2-pin open drain mode with separate LPI2C slave.

enumeratedValue.name: PINCFG_5
enumeratedValue.description: LPI2C configured for 2-pin output only mode (ultra-fast mode) with separate LPI2C slave.

enumeratedValue.name: PINCFG_6
enumeratedValue.description: LPI2C configured for 2-pin push-pull mode with separate LPI2C slave.

enumeratedValue.name: PINCFG_7
enumeratedValue.description: LPI2C configured for 4-pin push-pull mode (inverted outputs).

enumeratedValue.name: CMD_0
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit DATA[7:0].

enumeratedValue.name: CMD_1
enumeratedValue.description: Receive (DATA[7:0] + 1) bytes.

enumeratedValue.name: CMD_2
enumeratedValue.description: Generate STOP condition.

enumeratedValue.name: CMD_3
enumeratedValue.description: Receive and discard (DATA[7:0] + 1) bytes.

enumeratedValue.name: CMD_4
enumeratedValue.description: Generate (repeated) START and transmit address in DATA[7:0].

enumeratedValue.name: CMD_5
enumeratedValue.description: Generate (repeated) START and transmit address in DATA[7:0]. This transfer expects a NACK to be returned.

enumeratedValue.name: CMD_6
enumeratedValue.description: Generate (repeated) START and transmit address in DATA[7:0] using high speed mode.

enumeratedValue.name: CMD_7
enumeratedValue.description: Generate (repeated) START and transmit address in DATA[7:0] using high speed mode. This transfer expects a NACK to be returned.

enumeratedValue.name: TXCFG_0
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit Data Flag will only assert during a slave-transmit transfer when the transmit data register is empty.

enumeratedValue.name: TXCFG_1
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit Data Flag will assert whenever the transmit data register is empty.

enumeratedValue.name: RXCFG_0
enumeratedValue.description: Reading the receive data register will return receive data and clear the receive data flag.

enumeratedValue.name: RXCFG_1
enumeratedValue.description: Reading the receive data register when the address valid flag is set will return the address status register and clear the address valid flag. Reading the receive data register when the address valid flag is clear will return receive data and clear the receive data flag.

enumeratedValue.name: IGNACK_0
enumeratedValue.description: Slave will end transfer when NACK detected.

enumeratedValue.name: IGNACK_1
enumeratedValue.description: Slave will not end transfer when NACK detected.

enumeratedValue.name: HSMEN_0
enumeratedValue.description: Disables detection of Hs-mode master code.

enumeratedValue.name: HSMEN_1
enumeratedValue.description: Enables detection of Hs-mode master code.

enumeratedValue.name: ADDRCFG_0

enumeratedValue.name: ADDRCFG_1
enumeratedValue.description: Address match 0 (10-bit).

enumeratedValue.description: Address match 0 (7-bit) or Address match 1 (7-bit).

enumeratedValue.name: ADDRCFG_3
enumeratedValue.description: Address match 0 (10-bit) or Address match 1 (10-bit).

enumeratedValue.name: ADDRCFG_4
enumeratedValue.description: Address match 0 (7-bit) or Address match 1 (10-bit).

enumeratedValue.name: ADDRCFG_5
enumeratedValue.description: Address match 0 (10-bit) or Address match 1 (7-bit).

enumeratedValue.name: ADDRCFG_6
enumeratedValue.description: From Address match 0 (7-bit) to Address match 1 (7-bit).

enumeratedValue.name: ADDRCFG_7
enumeratedValue.description: From Address match 0 (10-bit) to Address match 1 (10-bit).

enumeratedValue.name: ANV_0
enumeratedValue.description: RADDR is valid.

enumeratedValue.name: ANV_1
enumeratedValue.description: RADDR is not valid.

enumeratedValue.name: TXNACK_0
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit ACK for received word.

enumeratedValue.name: TXNACK_1
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit NACK for received word.

enumeratedValue.name: RXEMPTY_0
enumeratedValue.description: The Receive Data Register is not empty.

enumeratedValue.name: RXEMPTY_1
enumeratedValue.description: The Receive Data Register is empty.

enumeratedValue.name: SOF_0
enumeratedValue.description: Indicates this is not the first data word since a (repeated) START or STOP condition.

enumeratedValue.name: SOF_1
enumeratedValue.description: Indicates this is the first data word since a (repeated) START or STOP condition.

enumeratedValue.name: FEATURE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Standard feature set.

enumeratedValue.name: FEATURE_3
enumeratedValue.description: Standard feature set with MODEM/IrDA support.

enumeratedValue.name: RST_0
enumeratedValue.description: Module is not reset.

enumeratedValue.name: RST_1
enumeratedValue.description: Module is reset.

enumeratedValue.name: TRGSEL_0
enumeratedValue.description: Input trigger is disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TRGSEL_1
enumeratedValue.description: Input trigger is used instead of RXD pin input.

enumeratedValue.name: TRGSEL_2
enumeratedValue.description: Input trigger is used instead of CTS_B pin input.

enumeratedValue.name: TRGSEL_3
enumeratedValue.description: Input trigger is used to modulate the TXD pin output. The TXD pin output (after TXINV configuration) is ANDed with the input trigger.

enumeratedValue.name: SBNS_0
enumeratedValue.description: One stop bit.

enumeratedValue.name: SBNS_1
enumeratedValue.description: Two stop bits.

field.name: RXEDGIE
field.description: RX Input Active Edge Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValue.name: RXEDGIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Hardware interrupts from STAT[RXEDGIF] are disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: RXEDGIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Hardware interrupt is requested when STAT[RXEDGIF] flag is 1.

enumeratedValue.name: LBKDIE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Hardware interrupts from STAT[LBKDIF] flag are disabled (use polling).

enumeratedValue.name: LBKDIE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Hardware interrupt requested when STAT[LBKDIF] flag is 1.

enumeratedValue.name: RESYNCDIS_0
enumeratedValue.description: Resynchronization during received data word is supported

enumeratedValue.name: RESYNCDIS_1
enumeratedValue.description: Resynchronization during received data word is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: BOTHEDGE_0
enumeratedValue.description: Receiver samples input data using the rising edge of the baud rate clock.

enumeratedValue.name: BOTHEDGE_1
enumeratedValue.description: Receiver samples input data using the rising and falling edge of the baud rate clock.

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_0
enumeratedValue.description: Address Match Wakeup

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_1
enumeratedValue.description: Idle Match Wakeup

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_2
enumeratedValue.description: Match On and Match Off

enumeratedValue.name: MATCFG_3
enumeratedValue.description: Enables RWU on Data Match and Match On/Off for transmitter CTS input

enumeratedValue.name: RIDMAE_0

enumeratedValue.name: RIDMAE_1

enumeratedValue.name: RDMAE_1

enumeratedValue.name: TDMAE_0
enumeratedValue.description: DMA request disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: TDMAE_1
enumeratedValue.description: DMA request enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: OSR_0

enumeratedValue.name: OSR_3

enumeratedValue.description: Oversampling ratio of 18.

enumeratedValue.description: Oversampling ratio of 19.

enumeratedValue.name: OSR_19
enumeratedValue.description: Oversampling ratio of 20.

enumeratedValue.name: OSR_20
enumeratedValue.description: Oversampling ratio of 21.

enumeratedValue.name: OSR_21
enumeratedValue.description: Oversampling ratio of 22.

enumeratedValue.name: OSR_22
enumeratedValue.description: Oversampling ratio of 23.

enumeratedValue.name: OSR_23
enumeratedValue.description: Oversampling ratio of 24.

enumeratedValue.description: Oversampling ratio of 25.

enumeratedValue.name: OSR_25
enumeratedValue.description: Oversampling ratio of 26.

enumeratedValue.description: Oversampling ratio of 27.
